coreAttributes.name: breast pump
coreAttributes.description: Designed to be attached to a person's breasts or udders via their open end, these hollow, plastic cylinders are connected to two tubes. One pressurises the container, while the other sucks up the milk that's drawn out of the wearer's nipples.

replacementText.self:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, before attaching the now-pressurised pumps to [npc.her] [npc.breasts+]. #IF(npc.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_NIPPLE)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The breast-pumps quickly drain [npc.namePos] nipple-creampie!)] #ENDIF
replacementText.other:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, before attaching the now-pressurised pumps to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_NIPPLE)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The breast-pumps quickly drain [npc2.namePos] nipple-creampie!)] #ENDIF
replacementText.otherRough:
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(crank)] up the dial on the milking machine, before roughly attaching the now-pressurised pumps to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_NIPPLE)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The breast-pumps quickly drain [npc2.namePos] nipple-creampie!)] #ENDIF

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pumps fall off of [npc.her] [npc.breasts+].
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pumps fall off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+].
displacementText.otherRough: With no regard for [npc2.her] comfort, [npc.name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the still-pressurised pumps off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+].

replacementText.self:
#IF(npc.hasBreastsCrotch()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, before attaching the now-pressurised pumps to [npc.her] [npc.udders+]. #IF(npc.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_NIPPLE_CROTCH)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The breast-pumps quickly drain [npc.namePos] nipple-creampie!)] #ENDIF #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, and even though [npc.she] [npc.do]n't have any udders, [npc.she] [npc.verb(decide)] to attach the now-pressurised pumps to [npc.her] stomach... #ENDIF
replacementText.other:
#IF(npc.hasBreastsCrotch()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, before attaching the now-pressurised pumps to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_NIPPLE_CROTCH)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The breast-pumps quickly drain [npc2.namePos] nipple-creampie!)] #ENDIF #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] up the dial on the milking machine, and even though [npc2.name] [npc2.do]n't have any udders, [npc.she] [npc.verb(decide)] to attach the now-pressurised pumps to [npc2.her] stomach... #ENDIF
replacementText.otherRough:
#IF(npc.hasBreastsCrotch()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(crank)] up the dial on the milking machine, before roughly attaching the now-pressurised pumps to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.breasts+]. #IF(npc2.getTotalFluidInArea(ORIFICE_NIPPLE_CROTCH)>0)
[style.italicsCum(The breast-pumps quickly drain [npc2.namePos] nipple-creampie!)] #ENDIF #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(crank)] up the dial on the milking machine, and even though [npc2.name] [npc2.do]n't have any udders, [npc.she] [npc.verb(decide)] to roughly attach the now-pressurised pumps to [npc2.her] stomach... #ENDIF

displacementText.self: #IF(npc.hasBreastsCrotch()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pumps fall off of [npc.her] [npc.udders+]. #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pumps fall off of [npc.her] stomach. #ENDIF
displacementText.other: #IF(npc.hasBreastsCrotch()) [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pumps fall off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.udders+]. #ELSE [npc.Name] [npc.verb(turn)] down the dial on the milking machine, before letting the rapidly-depressurising pumps fall off of [npc2.namePos] stomach. #ENDIF
displacementText.otherRough: #IF(npc.hasBreastsCrotch()) With no regard for [npc2.her] comfort, [npc.name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the still-pressurised pumps off of [npc2.namePos] [npc2.udders+]. #ELSE With no regard for [npc2.her] comfort, [npc.name] roughly [npc.verb(yank)] the still-pressurised pumps off of [npc2.namePos] stomach. #ENDIF
